name: cratered
content:

Add to word list
having one or more round holes in the surface: a cratered surface The road was cratered with potholes. See
crater
More examplesFewer examplesThe spacecraft returned images of a cratered world.Some areas of ground are heavily cratered.A visitor to Mercury would see a gray, cratered landscape.
